amendment.description: Amendment provides $6 million for the cost of broadband loans offset by a reduction in the Agriculture Buildings and Facilities and Rental Payments account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in the Congressional Record to provide $6 million for the cost of broadband loans offset by a reduction in the Agriculture Buildings and Facilities and Rental Payments account by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gibson amendment (A041) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 198 (Roll no. 442).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gibson amendment (A041) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 198 (Roll no. 442).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Gibson.
